description: Changes the password for the specified IAM user. You can use the AWS CLI, the AWS API, or the Users page in the IAM console to change the password for any IAM user.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Changing an IAM user's password allows an attacker to maintain access using a legitimate account.
Changing the password directly impacts the authentication process, potentially locking out legitimate users and ensuring only the attacker has access.
Changing the password of an IAM user can also serve as a means to remove legitimate account access for the rightful user, ensuring only the attacker can access the account.
